tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE StudentGrades (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name TEXT,
  subject TEXT,
  grade INT,
  semester TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE StudentGrades (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT REFERENCES Students(student_id),
    course_id INT REFERENCES Courses(course_id),
    grade INT,
    semester VARCHAR(50)
);
